items.sentence: Tom didn\'t know Mary thought he should leave.

I like garlic, but I don\'t eat it very often.

I\'m sure I can find something for you to eat.
I\'m sure Tom appreciates what you do for him.
Where did you live before moving to Australia?
I actually don\'t feel like going to the city.
Tom wants a full report by this time tomorrow.
Tom plans to stick around to see what happens.
Tom sometimes has trouble keeping his balance.
Tom is going to eventually be able to do that.

I\'ve done many interesting things in my life.

Tom will help Mary do that if she asks him to.

Tom is married with a three-year-old daughter.
